Reviews.Title: “You pay for the wow factor"”
Reviews.Author: herodan
Reviews.Content: youre looking bargain look else stay hotel exudes cool dont expect usual creature comforts youd five star shag pile carpets mountains free soap shampoo pay design thats basic price hotel charges deluxe basic charge change charge upgrade suite people expect stayed japanese designed looked supposed functional stylish walk dont touch ruin look hotel staff initially typically surly spanish friendly reception staff particularly helpful maps metro details hotel five minute walk avenida de america metro connections metro stations including airport catch 200 bus airport 2 euros leave airport walk hundred metres concourse course youre spending hotel youd probably cab cost 25 euros hotel facilities functional installed style pool swimming looks summer air plunge pool designed accomodate screaming kids blow whales bar expensive offers cocktails views city metro cheap easy main tourist destinations quickly clubbing taxi costs region 1015 euros central madrid tip unless speak fluent spanish driver card hotel postcode satnav idea special hotel special design attention detail special looking luxury base madrid bored hotel interior spend money else

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother!”
